verses.verse: Then he brought<WH3318> me forth<WH3318> into<WH413> the utter<WH2435> court,<WH2691> the way<WH1870> toward<WH1870> the north:<WH6828> and he brought<WH935> me into<WH413> the chamber<WH3957> that was over<WH5048> against<WH5048> the separate<WH1508> place, and which<WH834> was before<WH5048> the building<WH1146> toward<WH413> the north.<WH6828>
Before<WH413> <WH6440> the length<WH753> of an hundred<WH3967> cubits<WH520> was the north<WH6828> door,<WH6607> and the breadth<WH7341> was fifty<WH2572> cubits.<WH520>

Over<WH5048> against<WH5048> the twenty<WH6242> cubits which<WH834> were for the inner<WH6442> court,<WH2691> and over<WH5048> against<WH5048> the pavement<WH7531> which<WH834> was for the utter<WH2435> court,<WH2691> was gallery<WH862> against<WH413> <WH6440> gallery<WH862> in three<WH7992> stories.

And before<WH6440> the chambers<WH3957> was a walk<WH4109> to ten<WH6235> cubits<WH520> breadth<WH7341> inward,<WH6442> a way<WH1870> of one<WH259> cubit;<WH520> and their doors<WH6607> toward the north.<WH6828>

Now the upper<WH5945> chambers<WH3957> were shorter:<WH7114> for the galleries<WH862> were higher<WH5945> than these,<WH2007> than the lower,<WH8481> and than the middlemost<WH8484> of the building.<WH1146>

For they were in three<WH8027> stories, but had not pillars<WH5982> as the pillars<WH5982> of the courts:<WH2691> therefore<WH5921> <WH3651> the building was straitened<WH680> more than the lowest<WH8481> and the middlemost<WH8484> from the ground.<WH776>

And the wall<WH1447> that was without<WH2351> over<WH5980> against<WH5980> the chambers,<WH3957> toward<WH1870> the utter<WH2435> court<WH2691> on the forepart<WH6440> of the chambers,<WH3957> the length<WH753> thereof was fifty<WH2572> cubits.<WH520>

For the length<WH753> of the chambers<WH3957> that were in the utter<WH2435> court<WH2691> was fifty<WH2572> cubits:<WH520> and, see,<WH2009> before<WH5921> <WH6440> the temple<WH1964> were an hundred<WH3967> cubits.<WH520>
And from under<WH8478> these<WH428> chambers<WH3957> was the entry<WH3996> on the east<WH6921> side,<WH6921> as one goes<WH935> into them from the utter<WH2435> court.<WH2691>

The chambers<WH3957> were in the thickness<WH7341> of the wall<WH1444> of the court<WH2691> toward<WH1870> the east,<WH6921> over<WH413> <WH6440> against<WH6440> the separate<WH1508> place, and over against<WH6440> the building.<WH1146>

And the way<WH1870> before<WH6440> them was like the appearance<WH4758> of the chambers<WH3957> which<WH834> were toward<WH1870> the north,<WH6828> as long<WH753> as they, and as broad<WH7342> as they: and all<WH3605> their goings<WH4161> out were both according to their fashions,<WH4941> and according to their doors.<WH6607>

And according to the doors<WH6607> of the chambers<WH3957> that were toward<WH1870> the south<WH1864> was a door<WH6607> in the head<WH7218> of the way,<WH1870> even the way<WH1870> directly<WH1903> before<WH6440> the wall<WH1448> toward<WH1870> the east,<WH6921> as one enters<WH935> into them.

Then said<WH559> he to me, The north<WH6828> chambers<WH3957> and the south<WH1864> chambers,<WH3957> which<WH834> are before<WH413> <WH6440> the separate<WH1508> place, they be holy<WH6944> chambers,<WH3957> where<WH834> <WH8033> the priests<WH3548> that approach<WH7138> to the LORD<WH3068> shall eat<WH398> the most<WH6944> holy<WH6944> things: there<WH8033> shall they lay<WH3240> the most<WH6944> holy<WH6944> things, and the meat offering,<WH4503> and the sin<WH2403> offering, and the trespass<WH817> offering; for the place<WH4725> is holy.<WH6918>

When the priests<WH3548> enter<WH935> therein, then shall they not go<WH3318> out of the holy<WH6944> place into<WH413> the utter<WH2435> court,<WH2691> but there<WH8033> they shall lay<WH3240> their garments<WH899> wherein<WH834> they minister;<WH8334> for they are holy; and shall put<WH3847> on other<WH312> garments,<WH899> and shall approach<WH7126> to those things which<WH834> are for the people.<WH5971>

Now when he had made an end<WH3615> of measuring<WH4060> the inner<WH6442> house,<WH1004> he brought<WH3318> me forth<WH3318> toward<WH1870> the gate<WH8179> whose<WH834> prospect<WH6440> is toward<WH1870> the east,<WH6921> and measured<WH4058> it round<WH5439> about.
He measured<WH4058> the east<WH6921> side<WH7307> with the measuring<WH4060> reed,<WH7070> five<WH2568> hundred<WH520> reeds,<WH7070> with the measuring<WH4060> reed<WH7070> round<WH5439> about.
He measured<WH4058> the north<WH6828> side,<WH7307> five<WH2568> hundred<WH3967> reeds,<WH7070> with the measuring<WH4060> reed<WH7070> round<WH5439> about.
He measured<WH4058> the south<WH1864> side,<WH7307> five<WH2568> hundred<WH3967> reeds,<WH7070> with the measuring<WH4060> reed.<WH7070>
He turned<WH5437> about to the west<WH3220> side,<WH7307> and measured<WH4058> five<WH2568> hundred<WH3967> reeds<WH7070> with the measuring<WH4060> reed.<WH7070>

He measured<WH4058> it by the four<WH702> sides:<WH7307> it had a wall<WH2346> round<WH5439> about, five<WH2568> hundred<WH3967> reeds long,<WH753> and five<WH2568> hundred<WH3967> broad,<WH7341> to make a separation<WH914> between<WH996> the sanctuary<WH6944> and the profane<WH2455> place.
